partners.name: Worker Bees Africa
partners.alt_text: Worker Bees Africa logo - NGO dedicated to pollinator conservation and community empowerment in Tanzania
partners.description: A registered NGO in Tanzania dedicated to pollinator conservation and community empowerment. They blend conservation with socio-economic development, running education and advocacy programs. Founded by Ally Saburi, they highlight bees' role in biodiversity and food security.

seo.title: Worker Bees Africa - Pollinator Conservation NGO | Pollination Africa Summit Partner
seo.og_description: Worker Bees Africa is a registered NGO dedicated to pollinator conservation and community empowerment, partnering with Pollination Africa Summit 2026.

partners.name: TAPIDO
partners.alt_text: TAPIDO logo - Tanzania Apiculture Development Organization promoting sustainable beekeeping and environmental conservation
partners.description: Tanzania Apiculture Development Organization promotes sustainable beekeeping, environmental conservation, and community empowerment. They run training workshops, produce educational materials, and support women and youth in apiculture. Their mission is to improve livelihoods through honey production and pollinator conservation.

seo.title: TAPIDO - Tanzania Apiculture Development | Pollination Africa Summit Partner
seo.og_description: TAPIDO promotes sustainable beekeeping and environmental conservation in Tanzania, partnering with Pollination Africa Summit 2026.

partners.name: NAN Organik House
partners.alt_text: NAN Organik House logo - Beekeeping agribusiness and honeybee products from Nigeria
partners.description: An agribusiness venture focused on beekeeping and honeybee products including honey, beeswax, and royal jelly. They train and empower rural communities, women, and youth in modern beekeeping. Founded in Makurdi, Nigeria, by entrepreneur Abigail Anyorikyo.

seo.title: NAN Organik House - Beekeeping Agribusiness | Pollination Africa Summit Partner
seo.og_description: NAN Organik House is a beekeeping agribusiness empowering rural communities in Nigeria, partnering with Pollination Africa Summit 2026.

partners.name: Green Rural Community
partners.alt_text: Green Rural Community logo - Sustainable rural development and environmental conservation
partners.description: A grassroots organization focused on sustainable rural development including environmental conservation, apiculture and agriculture support, community empowerment, and green initiatives. They promote eco-friendly farming, reforestation, beekeeping, organic farming, and climate resilience in rural areas.

seo.title: Green Rural Community - Sustainable Rural Development | Pollination Africa Summit Partner
seo.og_description: Green Rural Community promotes sustainable rural development and environmental conservation, partnering with Pollination Africa Summit 2026.

partners.name: Female Guides Community Initiative
partners.alt_text: Female Guides Community Initiative logo - Empowering women tour guides in Tanzania
partners.description: Based in Moshi, Tanzania, this initiative supports women aspiring to become tour guides. They provide tuition, field gear, accommodation, and psychological support. Their mission is to reduce gender imbalance in the tourism sector and empower women with professional skills.

seo.title: Female Guides Community Initiative - Women Empowerment in Tourism | Pollination Africa Summit Partner
seo.og_description: Female Guides Community Initiative empowers women in Tanzania's tourism sector, partnering with Pollination Africa Summit 2026.

partners.name: NAT DMC
partners.full_name: North American Travel Destination Management Company
partners.alt_text: NAT DMC logo - Professional destination management company for events and conferences
partners.description: A professional destination management company specializing in organizing events, conferences, and group travel logistics. They provide transport fleets, communication systems, and end-to-end event coordination for seamless event experiences.

seo.title: NAT DMC - Destination Management Company | Pollination Africa Summit Partner
seo.og_description: NAT DMC provides professional event and conference management services, partnering with Pollination Africa Summit 2026.

partners.name: Chacha Technologies
partners.alt_text: Chacha Technologies logo - Web development and system integration partner
partners.description: A web development and system integration firm specializing in custom websites, payment gateway integration (e.g., M-Pesa APIs), and digital transformation consulting. Their focus is on scalable, reliable tech solutions for businesses.

seo.title: Chacha Technologies - Web Development Partner | Pollination Africa Summit
seo.og_description: Chacha Technologies provides web development and system integration services, partnering with Pollination Africa Summit 2026.
